title: 3 new cases of COVID-19 detected, bringing total to 98
description: In a press release, Public Health says of the 98 cases, 57 are travel related, 31 are close contacts of confirmed cases and four cases are from community transmission.
content: The province has announced three new cases of COVID Saturday all in the Fredericton area bringing the total infections to In a press release Public Health says of the cases are travel related are close contacts of confirmed cases and fou chars
